name: manifesto.js
description: IIIF Presentation API utility library for client and server

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && tsc -m es6 --outDir dist-esmodule && webpack
scripts.build-docs: rimraf -rf docs && typedoc --out docs --name manifesto --theme default --ignoreCompilerErrors --experimentalDecorators --emitDecoratorMetadata --target ES6 --moduleResolution node --preserveConstEnums --stripInternal --suppressExcessPropertyErrors --suppressImplicitAnyIndexErrors --module commonjs src/ && touch docs/.nojekyll

author: @edsilv
